bibl.title: The Meandering Identity of a Fayum Canal: The Henet of Moeris / Dioryx Kleonos / Bahr Wardan / Abdul Wahbi.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: Reworks material originally presented in: IDEM, A Ptolemaic Canal in the Northeast Fayyum: The History of the Bahr Wardan, Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists / Actes du neuvième Congrès international des égyptologues, Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004. Volume I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 150 (Leuven - Paris - Dudley, MA, 2007) pp. 1051-1060, 4 cartes. - Introduction. - Ptolemaic-Roman Period: The ḥn.t and ὀρεινὴ διῶρυξ. - Medieval Period: The Bahr Wardan. - Hawara, the Bahr Sharqiyyah, and Bahr Abdul Wahbi. - Demise of the ancient canal. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.seg: KRAEMER Bryan, The Meandering Identity of a Fayum Canal: The Henet of Moeris / Dioryx Kleonos / Bahr Wardan / Abdul Wahbi.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 365-375, 3 cartes.

Reworks material originally presented in: IDEM, A Ptolemaic Canal in the Northeast Fayyum: The History of the Bahr Wardan, Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists / Actes du neuvième Congrès international des égyptologues, Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004. Volume I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 150 (Leuven - Paris - Dudley, MA, 2007) pp. 1051-1060, 4 cartes. - Introduction. - Ptolemaic-Roman Period: The ḥn.t and ὀρεινὴ διῶρυξ. - Medieval Period: The Bahr Wardan. - Hawara, the Bahr Sharqiyyah, and Bahr Abdul Wahbi. - Demise of the ancient canal. - Conclusion.
